title: Legends
description: Dimlight had followed the woman and her trail had led him to Verita.The men from his past had followed the gold and something even more precious.Something they would do anything to get their hands upon.The local Governor wanted to keep everything to himself.The small village would soon become the center of an intense struggle the former man of the Lodge will attempt at first to evade. He had no more unfinished business, no more scores to settle, had left everything in the past. That is until their destructive plans had touched Vicare and brought forth an Assassin the old tales of the Hunters always considered a nightmare.This is the 3rd volume of the Dark Hunters series.
author: Angelo Tsanatelis
